eventDetails.title: Neo Coding
eventDetails.desc: Neo coding competition has three rounds: a 30-minute qualifying round with 25 multiple-choice questions, a 1-hour coding contest with 25 questions, and a final 1-hour contest with three questions of varying difficulty levels. It aims to test coders' knowledge and skill in various areas of coding, from basics to advanced topics.

eventDetails.title: Bug Smash
eventDetails.desc: The ultimate coding contest Bug Smash has three rounds: Debugging, Blind Coding, and Writing a Complete Code. These rounds challenge a coder's skill in fixing errors, visualizing and planning code, and writing efficient and clean code. The contest is open to all coders, and promises a thrilling competition with the best.

eventDetails.title: Hash it Out
eventDetails.desc: Hash It Out is a two-round programming event that tests coding enthusiasts' knowledge and skills. Round one has two coding questions, while round two has advanced questions. It's a great opportunity for programmers to network and learn new skills. The event promises exciting challenges and valuable prizes. Join us for a thrilling coding experience by registering now!

eventDetails.title: Robo Race
eventDetails.desc: Robo-Race is a global robotics event with three challenging rounds. The knockout round is a 2-hour race to complete the track in the shortest time possible. In the timer round, participants must navigate their vehicles through obstacles to advance. The final round is a test of skill and creativity to reach a specific location. Robo-Race is a chance to showcase robotics skills and compete with other enthusiasts. Register now for an unforgettable experience!

eventDetails.title: Think Tank
eventDetails.desc: Think Tank is a three-round event designed for entrepreneurs and startup owners. The first round involves presenting products to judges. In round two, participants discuss market trends and challenges. In round three, participants create a marketing script and tagline. Winners receive recognition for their marketing strategies. Think Tank provides networking opportunities and business insights. Register now for an informative and exciting event!

eventDetails.title: Offroad Rumble
eventDetails.desc: Offroad rumble is an exhilarating event where offroad vehicles race through rugged terrain, facing challenging obstacles and extreme terrain. This adrenaline-fueled competition tests drivers' skills, vehicles' capabilities, and endurance in a wild and unpredictable environment. From rocky hills and deep mud pits to steep slopes and water crossings, the offroad rumble event offers a thrilling experience for both participants and spectators alike.

eventDetails.title: Elentra
eventDetails.desc: Elentra is an exciting electrical event with three challenging rounds to showcase participants' skills. Round 1 requires correcting circuits, Round 2 involves completing half-drawn circuits, and the final round involves designing a hardware circuit based on given conditions. Register now to showcase your skills!

eventDetails.title: Saudagar
eventDetails.desc: Buisness plan competition organised by department of MBA in Zion Techfest

eventDetails.title: Robo Wrestling
eventDetails.desc: Robo-Wrestling is a thrilling event that brings together robotics enthusiasts from all over to compete in three rounds. Participants showcase their robot building skills as their bots wrestle with each other, and the winners face off in the final round to showcase their robot's strength and agility. Top performers are selected at the end of the event. Register now to showcase your robotics skills and compete in this exciting event!

eventDetails.title: Treasure Mania
eventDetails.desc: Join us for a thrilling treasure hunt! Solve clues, riddles, and puzzles as you explore the city, seeking hidden treasures and uncovering secrets along the way. Follow the map, hunt for clues, and use your wits to decipher the codes. With a team, it's the perfect way to spend an afternoon outdoors. So get ready to put your problem-solving skills to the test and discover hidden riches!

eventDetails.title: Madmax (Fifa) Solo
eventDetails.desc: Join the biggest FIFA tournament! Players compete in intense one-on-one matches, demonstrating their skills on the pitch with strategy, precision, and teamwork. Bring your A-game and experience the excitement of FIFA!

eventDetails.title: Madmax (Fifa) Duo
eventDetails.desc: Join the biggest FIFA tournament! Players compete in intense one-on-one matches, demonstrating their skills on the pitch with strategy, precision, and teamwork. Bring your A-game and experience the excitement of FIFA!

eventDetails.title: Madmax (Valorant)
eventDetails.desc: Valorant is a competitive game where 16 teams of 5 players each compete to be victorious. With unique abilities and strategic teamwork, players battle it out on various maps and game modes. This fast-paced game requires skill and tactical thinking to dominate the battlefield. Join the competition and prove your abilities in Valorant!

eventDetails.title: Electromaze (Solo)
eventDetails.desc: Electromaze is a 3-round electrical event testing technical skills. Participants build circuits in round 1 and solve complex problems in round 2. The final round involves implementing an electrical system. It's an excellent opportunity for aspiring engineers to gain valuable experience.

eventDetails.title: Electromaze (Group)
eventDetails.desc: Electromaze is a 3-round electrical event testing technical skills. Participants build circuits in round 1 and solve complex problems in round 2. The final round involves implementing an electrical system. It's an excellent opportunity for aspiring engineers to gain valuable experience.

eventDetails.title: Mystery Quest (Solo)
eventDetails.desc: Mystery Quest is an engaging quiz game that challenges participants in electrical and electronics. It includes three rounds: a multiple-choice online quiz, a crossword puzzle, and an "escape room" challenge. The game tests participants' knowledge, problem-solving skills, and creativity. Register now to put your skills to the test and enjoy an interactive experience!

eventDetails.title: Mystery Quest (Group)
eventDetails.desc: Mystery Quest is an engaging quiz game that challenges participants in electrical and electronics. It includes three rounds: a multiple-choice online quiz, a crossword puzzle, and an "escape room" challenge. The game tests participants' knowledge, problem-solving skills, and creativity. Register now to put your skills to the test and enjoy an interactive experience!

eventDetails.title: Techfeud
eventDetails.desc: Techfued is an event for tech enthusiasts, showcasing latest advancements in AI, robotics, blockchain, and IoT. Participants engage in workshops, presentations, and networking with like-minded individuals and companies. Whether you're a startup, investor, or tech enthusiast, it promises to be an unforgettable experience.
